item.title: Custom minigame HELP
item.dc:creator: @rikkert rikkert
item.description:
@rikkert wrote:

Hey!

I’ve made a minigame but there’s one problem.
When the waitingroom timer is 0 there’s nothing happends

This my code:

if(PlayerHandler.pcWaitTimer == 0 && addywait())
{
teleportToX = 2912;
teleportToY = 3610;
updateRequired = true;
}

Can someone help me?

Read full topic
